column4: can someone help me, I am trying to install Ubuntu using the Live CD and the Install icon on the desktop...it fully installs..and then reboots..but gets Error 17 when trying to load Grub
check this out: http://ubuntuforums.org/archive/index.php/t-75417.html - first link from a google search
looks like something went wrong setting up the /boot point.  a reinstall of grub and/or ubuntu might be in order, unfortunatly :(
you should be able to use system > administration > (some disk tool, depending on ubuntu version)
